user.title: Sendspin Browser Player
user.description: This integration turns the dashboard browser tab into a Sendspin player. Configure default values (optional).

data_description.server_url: e.g. http://homeassistant.local:8927 (Music Assistant) or leave empty to set in the panel.
data_description.player_name: Name shown for this player on the Sendspin server (e.g. "Living Room Dashboard").
